title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: When viewing the cross reference view and markers, the joinpoints assigned to advice are mixed up.
EB: When viewing the cross reference view and markers, the joinpoints assigned to advice should be correctly displayed.
SR:
1. Select line 22 and observe that there are 5 joinpoints displayed (should only be 3).
2. Select line 68 and observe that there are zero joinpoints displayed (should be 2 here).
3. Right-click the marker at line 68 and choose "advises". Note that you see all 5 joinpoints.
